cleaned_text: Balance Chiropractic Wellness and Fitness Services Colorado Springs, Colorado 38 followers About us Balance Chiropractic focuses on a unique area of Chiropractic compared to most. We never pop, twist or crack the spine. Most traditional chiropractors are excellent at obtaining their goals of managing secondary conditions (symptoms), however our objective is different... Dr. Pohl utilized state-of-the-art equipment to determine the presence of a Foundational Shift of the spine, which is typically the underlying cause of numerous secondary conditions (symptoms) that you may be experiencing. If Foundational Shift is detected, Dr. Pohl creates a personalized plan to correct these abnormalities so that you can feel and look your absolute best. - Website - [http://www.BalanceColorado.com](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2EBalanceColorado%2Ecom&urlhash=lkZx&trk=about_website) External link for Balance Chiropractic - Industries - Wellness and Fitness Services - Company size - 2-10 employees - Headquarters - Colorado Springs, Colorado - Type - Self-Employed Locations - Primary Balance Chiropractic 808 Village Center Drive Colorado Springs,
